Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I set a Screen Lock Timeout?  I would like to extend the lock timeout for my phone so that it is about 10 to 20 minutes till a password/pattern/pin is needed.  However, I don't want the screen to stay on that long.  Is there an application that either allows different timeouts, or provides it's own timeout for the screen, so that I can set it to a time less than the native timeout?  I have Froyo (2.2) on a Samsung Captivate (or Galaxy S).
Title: Looking for app that provides different screen timeout and lock timeout

history.Text: I would like to extend the lock timeout for my phone so that it is about 10 to 20 minutes till a password/pattern/pin is needed.  However, I don't want the screen to stay on that long.  Is there an application that either allows different timeouts, or provides it's own timeout for the screen, so that I can set it to a time less than the native timeout?  I have Froyo (2.2) on a Samsung Captivate (or Galaxy S).
